meanings.sent1: The unconformity between their stories raised suspicions.
meanings.sent2: The team's unconformity in opinions led to a lengthy discussion.
meanings.sent3: The unconformity in their dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unconventional style was an unconformity in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent5: The unconformity in their schedules caused chaos in the office.

meanings.sent1: The financial report showed an unconformity in the numbers.
meanings.sent2: There was an unconformity in the witness testimonies.
meanings.sent3: The unconformity in the cake's size made it look funny.
meanings.sent4: The unconformity in his statements raised doubts about his honesty.
meanings.sent5: The unconformity in the map confused the travelers.

meanings.sent1: Her unconformity to traditional customs made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unconformity to traditional painting techniques was refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The unconformity in his choice of toppings on pizza was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His unconformity to the rules of the game surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unconformity in her approach to problem-solving was innovative.
